description:
Section 73 application (minor material amendment) to vary condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref P101575 dated 18/10/10 for the: ‘Refurbishment and alterations to the exterior of the building including fenestrations changes and the infilling of existing recesses at the rear of the building to provide additional residential accommodation.  Introduction of glass canopy entrance to the front of the building and the erection of a refuse enclosure and cycle racks.  Provision of additional onsite car parking spaces.  Other associated and minor works.’  The minor material amendments are:
A]	Installation of soil vent pipes and kitchen extracts tothe north and south, side elevations of the 7 storey building.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of the 18 October 2013.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 18 October 2010 [LBI ref: P101575].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5)
